sentences.english: Each disaccharide is composed of two monosaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 每一種雙糖都是由兩個單糖組成。

sentences.english: Uronic acid can be synthesized by oxidation of monosaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 目前糖醛酸的合成主要是以單糖爲原料氧化而得。

sentences.english: The simple sugars from fruits are important nutrients and vitamins for our body.
sentences.chinese: 水果中的單糖是身體中需要的重要營養素和維生素。

sentences.english: Unlike typical weight-gain formulas that are loaded with simple sugars and fat.
sentences.chinese: 與典型重量增益與單糖和脂肪加載公式。

sentences.english: Applying TLC to analyze monosaccharide composition of polysaccharides was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用薄層色譜法分析多糖的單糖組成。
最常見的單糖是已糖和戊糖。

sentences.english: Trade in good, complex carbohydrates (low glycemic index) for the bad, simple carbs (sugar).
sentences.chinese: 用低糖或者複雜的糖類代替不良單糖。

sentences.english: By the chemical simulation in vitro, the antioxidant activity of PP2 had been studied .
sentences.chinese: 通過氣相色譜儀對多糖的單糖組成進行分析。

sentences.english: Triethylamine developing system is suitable for different kinds of monosaccharides analysis.
sentences.chinese: 三乙胺展開體系適合各種單糖的分離。

sentences.english: HPCE was applied to analysis its monosaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 單糖組分分析採用高效毛細管電泳。

sentences.english: Sugars and starches are broken down into simple sugars during digestion.
sentences.chinese: 糖和澱粉在消化過程中被分解爲單糖。

sentences.english: The compositions and monosaccharide content in the Lycium Barbarum polysaccharide were analyzed by IR and GC-MS.
sentences.chinese: 分析了枸杞水溶性多糖中單糖組成及其含量。

sentences.english: Glycosidic bond A bond formed between monosaccharides by removal of water.
sentences.chinese: 單糖間脫掉一分子水後形成的一種鍵。

sentences.english: glycant vail over free glycoses in natural foods.
sentences.chinese: 天然食物中的聚糖大大多餘遊離單糖。

sentences.english: This chapter begins with a presentation of the simple sugars and builds from there to larger and more complex structures.
sentences.chinese: 本章由單糖開始，在此基礎上講述更大更復雜的結構。

sentences.english: A biomass hydrolyzing process for producing glucose was investigated, through concentrated sulfuric acid hydrolysis of wood chips.
sentences.chinese: 以木屑爲研究對象，進行濃硫酸水解，得到產物單糖。

definition: thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]
